CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: "Thousands Thrilled at Courier Home Service Fair...11. Wear-Ever Aluminium Company, who gave away beautiful aluminium ware at each session was represented by Mrs. Grace Emert...Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Grace Emert standing in Wear Ever Aluminium Company of America booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
